content.question: ​The fifth term of a geometric sequence is <math alttext="24"><semantics><mn>24</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, and the sixth term is <math alttext="48"><semantics><mn>48</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. What is the value of the tenth term?

topic.text: 2.1: Change in Arithmetic and Geometric Sequences

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
